pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python3 Toolbox A utility set for :1 - Filesystem2 - Time3 - Print4 - AWS5 - Elasticsearch6 - Image7 - Network... etcFor install :> pip install py3toolboxFor upgrade:> pip install py3toolbox --upgrade --no-cache-dirFor PyPi upload:> twine upload dist/* --repository-url https://upload.pypi.org/legacy/
